name: Samurai Conquest: 3D Samurai Slayer Games For Kids
name_original: Samurai Conquest: 3D Samurai Slayer Games For Kids
description:
One of the Most addictive rpg game on AppStore!

The Samurai is back... and he’s here to save the kingdom from deadly demons!

Play as the heroic Samurai, to defend your kingdom against even nastier hordes of brutal demons!
